title: 租的服务器63格以上不能放水怎么解除
author: wp191315
txt_content:
tb租的服务器，63格以上不能放水，服主可以放，但是不流动，ess文件夹的config文件里找不到63格的限制，不知道在哪里调

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
参考这个
服务器不能在63格以上放水
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-839662-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: kelord
replies.txt_content:
在res插件的配置文件找到这里，第一个是设置流动，第二个是放置，我改成了80格高
Flow:
      # Level from which one to start lava and water flow blocking
      # This dont have effect in residence area
      Level: 80
      # With this set to true, lava flow outside residence is blocked
      NoLavaFlow: true
      # With this set to true, water flow outside residence is blocked
      NoWaterFlow: false
      Worlds:
      - world
    Place:
      # Level from which one to start block lava and water place
      # This don't have effect in residence area
      Level: 80
      # With this set to true, playrs cant place lava outside residence
      NoLavaPlace: true
      # With this set to true, playrs cant place water outside residence
      NoWaterPlace: true
      Worlds:
      - world

replies.author: 小cheng
replies.txt_content: 楼主应该用的是面板服，和自带的服务器配置吧，如果是找到plugins里的插件，一一找找，因为卖家的整合服务端安装了防作弊的插件。找到删除就了，或者联系客服直接问是哪个插件。
